content.html: Big news for short links! gcs.civilservice.gov.uk/blog/link-shor… I'm so happy to have contributed to this excellent guidance on why Government communications shouldn't use 3rd party link shortening services. A few highlights...
content.value:
Big news for short links!
gcs.civilservice.gov.uk/blog/link-shor…
I'm so happy to have contributed to this excellent guidance on why Government communications shouldn't use 3rd party link shortening services.

A few highlights...
